ygData.subject: Things are happening, man!
ygData.msgSnippet: McGowan holds Sarge s head in one hand. She smiles and chuckles. Barrymore stares and lights up a cigarette. Barrymore: What are you going to do with that?

------=_NextPart_000_030D_01C15434.4DC3E180
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

McGowan holds Sarge's head in one hand. She smiles and chuckles. Barrymore =
stares and lights up a cigarette.


Barrymore: What are you going to do wit=
h that?


McGowan: Hang it on the wall, I guess.


Stiller: I wanna eat it!=



Lee: F*** you, Stiller! The wall is where it belongs!


Barrymore: Shoul=
d burn it...


Stiller growls and eyes Lee. Depp scratches at his katana, t=
rying to chip off dried blood. Barrymore coughes and blows smoke in Stiller=
's face. He recoils.


Barrymore: We really need to start a fight or attack=
 someone...


Virgo looks at the ground.


Virgo: I still say we should go =
back kill that furry b*tch. That's all she deserves. Cold slow death...


A=
lba sighs and Barrymore offers her a cigarette. Alba takes it and Barrymore=
 lights it for her.


McGowan raises an eyebrow while staring at Sarge's he=
ad.


McGowan: Damn this thing is ugly!

~~~~~~

All of my alliance bots si=
t outside. Venomous looks at Quake.


Quake: I remember when things were fi=
ne...I could sit back with a beer and my troubles would be gone. And then I=
 fell into a pit...A pit of hell and sh*t...I ended up here...Man...I see w=
here things went wrong too...


Twister: Shut the hell up! Huh? How about t=
hat!? Shut up! I've had enough of your stupid sh*t!


Blizzard stood up.


=
Blizzard: Twister, your not our leader! Sit down and shut up! I let you pus=
h me around before, but not anymore! You don't have the right! We can do wh=
at we want without your permission!...


Fascino slaps her forehead, thinki=
ng that Blizzard's actions were insane and brainless.


The whole time Veno=
mous was shaking his head and waving his arms, trying to get Blizzard to st=
op. Wrath lights up a cigarette and Fascino slaps it away from him. He smil=
es for a minute but quickly covers it up with a stale frown. Twister looks =
at Blizzard.


Twister: What the hell is this!? Daddy's little precious bab=
y girl, finally stands up for herself! Is that it? Well, you know what? It'=
s up to you if you want to stand up for yourself! Cause you know what? You =
don't count! You never did! Sit down!!!...


Blizzard sits down on the grou=
nd.


Twister: That's what I thought...All talk...That's all...


Blizzard =
put a hand behind her back and looked at Venomous. He looked at her and sho=
ok his head. Blizzard looks away and sighs.


Fascino stands up, walking aw=
ay from the others. Wrath follows her.


Wrath: Kamodia, how about we fight=
, like in the old days? I'll beat you again.


Fascino: Up yours! I won bac=
k then, and I will now. And that's not my name asshole! Battle with knives.=
..


Fascino pulls out a knife. Wrath pulls out a knife. The others watch f=
rom a distance. Wrath runs at Fascino. Fascino drops her knife and pulls ou=
t a rifle and shoots Wrath in the head 5 times. He comes to a halt and coll=
apses. His optics go dim and his spark joins the matrix. Fascino takes Wrat=
h's knife and puts her rifle and 2 knives on her belt. Fascino walks back o=
ver to the others.


Quake: That was so goddamn sweet! I loved that! Damn! =
I wish I did that! It was awesome!


Twister smiles. Death always made her =
happy. Quake claps his hands. Blizzard just stared.


Blizzard: Shouldn't s=
omeone say something? Someone just died!


Venomous: Yeah.....Your right...=
..I want his gun!..


Venomous runs up to Wrath's lifeless body and takes h=
i gun. He walks back over to the others.


Venomous: The gun of a an ass be=
comes the gun of a cool bounty hunter!


Blizzard stands up.


Blizzard: Fa=
scino, your my friend! How could you do that! Haven't you ever lost someone=
?


Fascino: I'm not your friend.


Blizzard: Not only was that cold and br=
utal, but you cheated!


Fascino: That's what it's all about.


Twister: Am=
en.


Blizzard: No! That was awful! He wanted a clean fight!


Fascino: Cle=
an? He wanted me dead so I patched things up betweem us. Go ahead and ask h=
im...


Quake: WOO! This is a hoot!


Quake claps his hands.


Blizzard: It=
 was wrong!


Twister: She's right.....You should have flushed his spark do=
wn the toilet. That would have been perfect.


Fascino: I guess so...


Bli=
zzard: Doesn't anyone agree with me?


No one says anything.


Blizzard: We=
ll, FINE! I'll do well on my own!...Twister, your my sister and don't seem =
to care? Is that how it'll always be?


No one says anything. Blizzard turn=
s and starts walking away.


Blizzard: Then bye.


Twister stands up and ru=
ns up to Blizzard.


Blizzard: Hmm?


Twister: You forgot something...


Tw=
ister pulls out a small rifle and presses it to Blizzard's stomach. She pul=
ls the trigger and Blizzard's guts spray from the hole in the back. She col=
lapses and her spark leaves her body. Twister shoots the spark, sending spa=
rkles all around. Quake claps his hands. Venomous runs up to Blizzard's cor=
pse and takes her gun. Fascino starts to walk away.


Quake: Where ya going=
?


Fascino: I'll know sooner or later...


Venomous: If you die, tell me, =
cause I'll want your gun.


Twister: Your leaving, huh? Well, good kill and=
 bye.


Fascino: Yeah...Well...I guess the way I travel is quite like a fem=
ale I met before...I'm solo...


Fascino smiles and keeps walking. Quake ey=
es the large scar on Fascino's back. From one shoulder to her hip.


Quake:=
 Did that hurt!?


Fascino doesn't answer Quake. Then Armada, who was silen=
t through the whole thing, stands up and runs off.


Twister shakes her hea=
d.


Twister: I doubt either one will survive survive.


Venomous: Remember=
, I want their guns!


Quake: Who's up for poker?...

~~~~~~

Birdbot turns=
 around, heading towards the Chivtron base. Papertron follows on the ground=
.


Birdbot: I'm going to get that slut that took my friend. I'm going to k=
ill her, and use her as a floor mat and eat Doritos!


Papertron: Cool! HEH=
!...HEH!...HEH!...


Birdbot: Yeah...I'll redrum her all over the base...

=

Papertron: Yeah! Or maybe some whiskey instead! Erf fer fer fer!


Birdbot=
: Here is my plan! I'll throw water all over the floor! That slut will slip=
 on it and become easy prey! I'll poke her eyes out and fly into her face s=
cratching her! Then when she's weak, I'll stab her with a knife, and go for=
 the heart! And then she is my icky door mat and I'll eat everyone Doritos =
and kill my ex-friend for betraying me!


Papertron: AWESOME! FAR! But...Ho=
w can we get into the base? We're enemies now...


Birdbot: That's not impo=
rtant! We figure that out after their all dead!


Papertron: Oh...Okay...An=
d I'll get some romaine lettuce! GREENS! And run through them! Erf fer fer =
fer! MY CONE TO YOURS!...

~~~~~~

Mantella breathes heavily. She let out t=
iny whimpers and shreiks. Then she screamed. She stood up and with a knife =
she cut her shoulders. She sighs cuts a single letter on chest. An S. She s=
miles and kicks the wall she was leaning on.


Mantella: Hey! Anyone in thi=
s old shitty mine cave!? Huh!? Well!? Okay, then...I'll make my name known.=
..And I don't mean some shitty name gave to me by my drug dealing parents!.=
..Call me Mantella, and I call you dead! You call me Scan...Yeah, that's ri=
ght...You heard it! And next time when I'm dying, let me DIE!...Goddamn...W=
here I come from you let someone die if thats what they want!...


Scan lig=
hts up 5 cigarettes at once and starts smoking all of them.


Scan: Put on =
a f***ing circus or something, why don't ya?...


Scan drops all 5 cigarett=
es on the floor.


Scan: Hey! Someone's in the base that shouldn't be! Like=
, theresa maximal and predacon! Or something!...Aw, shit...


Scan stomps t=
he cigarettes out...She leaves the base and pulls out a rifle while she wal=
ks off...

~~~~~~

Zoe stands outside with her arms crossed. She contacts a=
ll Trainers on her commlink.


Zoe: Where the f*** is everyone!?

~~~~~~

A=
 spaceship soars through outer space...Heading towards earth...

~~~~~~

OO=
C: I plan for this ship to crash and be destroyed.
